articles.description: The current India-Canada crisis has exposed a sharp disconnect between India and the West on the issue of Sikh separatism. Michael Kugelman of the Wilson Center's South Asia Institute explains why.

articles.title: Asian Paints' boss Ashwin Dani says he got into IIM but didn’t do MBA. Old video resurfaces - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Ashwin Dani shared that he chose to not join IIM in 1965 after having gotten admission and paid the fees. 'Would any of the youngsters do so in today's time?' he asked.
